roleset.name: natural disaster: rockslide
roleset.note: ROCKSLIDE-N NOTES: Added by Julia in a Natural Disaster roleset endeavor. Comparison to avalanche, mudslide, landslide, lahar. (from rockslide.01-n)

roles.note: The "VSP" function tags on 'death/injury toll' and 'damages/cost' correspond to the RED cause relation.

example.name: rockslide-n
example.text: In April 1974 a gigantic and fast rockslide with a volume estimated at 1 to 1.3?109 m3 dammed the Mantaro river in the Peruvian Andes, causing more than 450 casualties and forming a 130 m to 150 m high dam [16, 17].
example.arg: with a volume estimated at 1 to 1.3?109 m3
